name: Poutine Please! (Mobile Demo)
description:
Poutine Please! is a basic & simple mobile platformer about a man who dies and is reincarnated as a poutine in a world where everyone wants to eat him.

I started this project because my wife is obsessed with Super Mario. I always wanted to make my own game so I decided to create something similar for her during my free time using the Godot engine.

Please enjoy this short demo & hit me with some feedback. :]
